topics.body: I'm about to go to bed, but well shit; you know how everyone's panicking about the ebola outbreak in Africa?  Projections show that it's probably going to infect 1.4million in the next year; while it's no where near as bad as what people were worried about that's still a fuck ton of people.  This strain is killing about 60% of people, so 1.4million * 60% = around 840,000 dead by next year.
